onmsR 0.2.4

  • Changelog

Changelog

Source: NEWS.md

onmsR 0.2.4

  • Updated sanctuaries to latest from https://sanctuaries.noaa.gov/library/imast_gis.html, as of November 12, 2025.

onmsR 0.2.3

  • Drop dependencies on deprecated rgdal and raster packages in favor of terra. This only affects the ply2erddap() function.

onmsR 0.2.2

  • Force ERDDAP URL of https://coastwatch.pfeg.noaa.gov/erddap/ vs default rerddap::eurl() of https://upwell.pfeg.noaa.gov/erddap/.

onmsR 0.2.1

  • Replaced all instances of “nms4R” with “onmsR”.

onmsR 0.2.0

  • Moved Reporting functions to infographiqR per marinebon/infographiqR#60 and renamed to R package to onmsR.

onmsR 0.1.4

  • Added a NEWS.md file to track changes to the package.
  • Dropped tidyverse dependency.

On this page

Developed by Ben Best, Jai Ranganathan.
